00029    /* 
00030    * Constructor
00031    */
00032    CfbDoubleRebridgeMove::CfbDoubleRebridgeMove(McSystem& system) : 
00033       CfbRebridgeBase(system),
00034       speciesId_(-1),
00035       nRegrow_(-1),
00036       bridgeLength_(0)
00037    {} 
00038    
00039    /* 
00040    * Read parameters speciesId, nRegrow, and nTrial
00041    */
00042    void CfbDoubleRebridgeMove::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00043    {
00044       // Read parameters
00045       readProbability(in);
00046       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00047       read<int>(in, "nRegrow", nRegrow_);
00048       read<double>(in, "bridgeLength", bridgeLength_);
00049 
00050       // Read parameters hold by RebridgeBase
00051       CfbRebridgeBase::readParam(in);
00052 
00053       // Initialize tables for spring constants and normalizations.
00054       setup();
00055 
00056       // Use dynamic_cast to check that the Species is actually a Linear species
00057       Linear* chainPtr;
00058       chainPtr = dynamic_cast<Linear*>(&(simulation().species(speciesId_)));
00059   
00060       // Allocate array to store old positions 
00061       iOldPos_.allocate(nRegrow_); 
00062       jOldPos_.allocate(nRegrow_); 
00063    }
00064 
00065 
00066    /* 
00067    * Generate, attempt and accept or reject a Monte Carlo move.
00068    *
00069    * A complete move involve the following stepts:
00070    *
00071    *    1) choose a molecule-i randomly;
00072    *    2) find molecule-j of the same type as i, and monomer pairs satisfying
00073    *       the distance criterion exist;
00074    *    3) Delete the two rebridging monomers; first molecule-i, then -j.
00075    *    4) Rebuild molecule-j, then -i. (in the JCP paper, the order is chosen
00076    *       at random.)
00077    *
00078    */
00079    bool CfbDoubleRebridgeMove::move() 
00080    {
00081       bool      found, accept;
00082       int       iMol, jMol, sign, beginId, nEnd, i;
00083       Molecule *iPtr;     // pointer to i-th molecule
00084       Molecule *jPtr;     // pointer to j-th molecule
00085       int      *bonds;    // bond types of a consequtive blocks of atoms
00086       Atom     *thisPtr;  // pointer to the current end atom
00087       Atom     *tempPtr;  // pointer used for swap atom positions
00088       double    rosenbluth, rosen_r,  rosen_f;
00089       double    energy, energy_r, energy_f;
00090       double    po2n, pn2o;
00091       Vector    swapPos;
00092 
00093       incrementNAttempt();
00094 
00095       // Choose a random direction
00096       if (random().uniform(0.0, 1.0) > 0.5)
00097          sign = +1;
00098       else
00099          sign = -1;
00100 
00101       // Search for a pair of candidate sites and calculate probability 
00102       found = forwardScan(sign, iMol, jMol, beginId, po2n);
00103       if (!found) return found;
00104 
00105       iPtr = &(system().molecule(speciesId_, iMol));
00106       jPtr = &(system().molecule(speciesId_, jMol));
00107 
00108       // Save positions for atoms to be regrown
00109       thisPtr = &(iPtr->atom(beginId));
00110       tempPtr = &(jPtr->atom(beginId));
00111       for (i = 0; i < nRegrow_; ++i) {
00112          iOldPos_[i] = thisPtr->position();
00113          jOldPos_[i] = tempPtr->position();
00114 
00115          thisPtr += sign;
00116          tempPtr += sign;
00117       }
00118 
00119       // Prepare for the rebridge move
00120       accept = false;
00121 
00122       bonds = new int[nRegrow_ + 1];
00123       if (sign == +1) {
00124          for (i = 0; i < nRegrow_ + 1; ++i)
00125             bonds[i] = iPtr->bond(beginId - 1 + nRegrow_ - i).typeId();
00126       } else {
00127          for (i = 0; i < nRegrow_ + 1; ++i)
00128             bonds[i] = iPtr->bond(beginId - nRegrow_ + i).typeId();
00129       }
00130 
00131       // Deleting atoms: first i-th molecule, then j-th
00132       rosen_r = 1.0;
00133       energy_r = 0.0;
00134 
00135       thisPtr = &(iPtr->atom(beginId + (nRegrow_-1)*sign));
00136       deleteSequence(nRegrow_, sign, thisPtr, bonds, rosenbluth, energy);
00137       rosen_r *= rosenbluth;
00138       energy_r += energy;
00139 
00140       thisPtr = &(jPtr->atom(beginId + (nRegrow_-1)*sign));
00141       deleteSequence(nRegrow_, sign, thisPtr, bonds, rosenbluth, energy);
00142       rosen_r *= rosenbluth;
00143       energy_r += energy;
00144 
00145       // Swap the atom positions of the dangling end
00146       if (sign == +1)
00147          nEnd = iPtr->nAtom() - beginId - nRegrow_;
00148       else
00149          nEnd = beginId + 1 - nRegrow_;
00150 
00151       thisPtr = &(iPtr->atom(beginId + nRegrow_*sign));
00152       tempPtr = &(jPtr->atom(beginId + nRegrow_*sign));
00153       for (i = 0; i < nEnd; ++i) {
00154          swapPos = thisPtr->position();
00155          //system().moveAtom(*thisPtr, tempPtr->position());
00156          thisPtr->position() = tempPtr->position();
00157          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00158          system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*thisPtr);
00159          #endif
00160          //system().moveAtom(*tempPtr, swapPos);
00161          tempPtr->position() = swapPos;
00162          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00163          system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*tempPtr);
00164          #endif
00165 
00166          thisPtr += sign;
00167          tempPtr += sign;
00168       }
00169 
00170       // Regrow atoms: first j-th molecule, then i-th
00171       rosen_f = 1.0;
00172       energy_f = 0.0;
00173 
00174       thisPtr = &(jPtr->atom(beginId));
00175       addSequence(nRegrow_, sign, thisPtr, bonds, rosenbluth, energy);
00176       rosen_f *= rosenbluth;
00177       energy_f += energy;
00178 
00179       thisPtr = &(iPtr->atom(beginId));
00180       addSequence(nRegrow_, sign, thisPtr, bonds, rosenbluth, energy);
00181       rosen_f *= rosenbluth;
00182       energy_f += energy;
00183 
00184       // Reverse scan
00185       found = reverseScan(sign, iMol, jMol, beginId - sign, pn2o);
00186 
00187       // Decide whether to accept or reject
00188       if (found)
00189          accept = random().metropolis(rosen_f * pn2o / rosen_r / po2n);
00190       else
00191          accept = false;
00192 
00193       if (accept) {
00194 
00195          // Increment counter for accepted moves of this class.
00196          incrementNAccept();
00197 
00198       } else {
00199 
00200          // If the move is rejected, restore nRegrow_ positions
00201          thisPtr = &(iPtr->atom(beginId));
00202          tempPtr = &(jPtr->atom(beginId));
00203          for (i = 0; i < nRegrow_; ++i) {
00204             //system().moveAtom(*thisPtr, iOldPos_[i]);
00205             thisPtr->position() = iOldPos_[i];
00206             #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00207             system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*thisPtr);
00208             #endif
00209             //system().moveAtom(*tempPtr, jOldPos_[i]);
00210             tempPtr->position() = jOldPos_[i];
00211             #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00212             system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*tempPtr);
00213             #endif
00214 
00215             thisPtr += sign;
00216             tempPtr += sign;
00217          }
00218 
00219          // Restore atom positions at the dangling end
00220          thisPtr = &(iPtr->atom(beginId + nRegrow_*sign));
00221          tempPtr = &(jPtr->atom(beginId + nRegrow_*sign));
00222          for (i = 0; i < nEnd; ++i) {
00223             swapPos = thisPtr->position();
00224             //system().moveAtom(*thisPtr, tempPtr->position());
00225             thisPtr->position() = tempPtr->position();
00226             #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00227             system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*thisPtr);
00228             #endif
00229             //system().moveAtom(*tempPtr, swapPos);
00230             tempPtr->position() = swapPos;
00231             #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00232             system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*tempPtr);
00233             #endif
00234 
00235             thisPtr += sign;
00236             tempPtr += sign;
00237          }
00238 
00239       }
00240 
00241       // Release memory
00242       delete [] bonds;
00243 
00244       return accept;
00245    }
00246 
00247    /*
00248    * Scanning chains to find all possible pairs of rebriding sites satisfying
00249    * the distance criterion, then choose one randomly to commit the double
00250    * rebridging move.
00251    *
00252    *    probability = 1 / (number of pairs satisfying the distance criterion)
00253    *
00254    *    rebriding criterion:
00255    *
00256    *          distance(i1,j2) < bridgeLength
00257    *       && distance(i2,j1) < bridgeLength
00258    *
00259    *                   i1   i2
00260    *           -->------o-o-o----   i-chain
00261    *                     \ /
00262    *                      X
00263    *                     / \
00264    *           -->------o-o-o----   j-chain
00265    *                   j1   j2
00266    *
00267    *
00268    */
00269    bool CfbDoubleRebridgeMove::forwardScan(int sign, int &iMol,
00270                             int &jMol, int &beginId, double &prob)
00271    {
00272       Molecule *iPtr, *jPtr;
00273       Vector   iPos1, jPos1, iPos2, jPos2;
00274       int      nMol, nAtom, maxPair;
00275       int      signRegrow, nPairs, k, choice;
00276       int      *molBuf, *atomBuf;
00277       double   lengthSq, bridgeLengthSq;  
00278       bool     found;
00279 
00280       // Number of molecules
00281       nMol = system().nMolecule(speciesId_);
00282 
00283       // Randomly choose one molecule
00284       iPtr = &(system().randomMolecule(speciesId_));
00285       iMol = system().moleculeId(*iPtr);
00286 
00287       // Number of atoms per molecule
00288       nAtom = iPtr->nAtom();
00289 
00290       // Require that chain length - 2 >= nRegrow_
00291       if (nRegrow_ > nAtom - 2) {
00292          UTIL_THROW("nRegrow_  >= chain length");
00293       }
00294 
00295       // Allocate arrays holding candidate atom pairs
00296       maxPair = (nMol - 1) * (nAtom - 1 - nRegrow_);
00297       molBuf  = new int[maxPair];  
00298       atomBuf = new int[maxPair];  
00299       
00300       // Identify the direction of scaning
00301       beginId = (sign == -1) ? (nAtom-1) : 0;
00302 
00303       // Auxiliary variables
00304       signRegrow = sign * (nRegrow_ + 1);
00305       bridgeLengthSq = bridgeLength_ * bridgeLength_;
00306 
00307       // Nullify counters
00308       nPairs = 0; 
00309       found  = false;
00310 
00311       // Loop over j molecules to scan possible pairs
00312       for (jMol = 0; jMol < nMol; ++jMol) {
00313 
00314          jPtr = &(system().molecule(speciesId_, jMol));
00315 
00316          if (jMol != iMol) {
00317 
00318             for (k = 0; k <  nAtom - 1 - nRegrow_; ++k) {  
00319 
00320                // Check if i1 to j2 bridging is possible
00321                iPos1 = iPtr->atom(beginId + k*sign).position();
00322                jPos2 = jPtr->atom(beginId + signRegrow + k*sign).position();
00323                lengthSq = boundary().distanceSq(iPos1, jPos2);
00324 
00325                if (lengthSq < bridgeLengthSq) {
00326                   // Check if j2 to i1 bridging is possible          
00327                   jPos1 = jPtr->atom(beginId + k*sign).position();
00328                   iPos2 = iPtr->atom(beginId + signRegrow + k*sign).position();
00329                   lengthSq = boundary().distanceSq(iPos2, jPos1);
00330                   
00331                   if (lengthSq < bridgeLengthSq) {
00332                      molBuf[nPairs]  = jMol;
00333                      atomBuf[nPairs] = beginId + k*sign;
00334                      nPairs += 1;
00335                   }  
00336                }
00337 
00338             } // loop over atom positions
00339          } // if jMol != iMol
00340       } // loop over j molecules
00341       
00342       if (nPairs > 0) found = true;
00343       
00344       if (found) {
00345          // iMol is not changed after the random selection
00346          choice  = random().uniformInt(0, nPairs);  
00347          jMol    = molBuf[choice];
00348          beginId = atomBuf[choice] + sign; // return the the active atom ID
00349          prob    = 1.0 / double(nPairs);
00350       } else {
00351          iMol    = -1;  // invalid value
00352          jMol    = -1;  // invalid value
00353          beginId = -1;  // invalid value
00354          prob    = 0.0;
00355       }   
00356       
00357       // Deallocate memory and quit
00358       delete [] molBuf;
00359       delete [] atomBuf;
00360       return found;
00361 
00362    }
00363    
00364    /*
00365    * Scanning chains to find the probability of choosing the specific reverse
00366    * move.
00367    *    probability = 1 / (number of pairs satisfying the distance criterion)
00368    *
00369    * This method is different than the forward one in two aspects:
00370    *    (1) It first check if the old configuration is one possible reverse
00371    *        move; and return "0" probability if not.
00372    *    (2) It does not store the indices of possible monomer pairs and simply
00373    *        count the number of all possible bridging sites.
00374    */
00375    bool CfbDoubleRebridgeMove::reverseScan(int sign, int iMol,
00376                                 int jMol, int beginId, double &prob)
00377    {
00378       Molecule *iPtr, *jPtr;
00379       Vector   iPos1, jPos1, iPos2, jPos2;
00380       int      nMol, nAtom, j;
00381       int      signRegrow, nPairs, headId, k;
00382       double   lengthSq, bridgeLengthSq;  
00383       bool     found;
00384 
00385       // Retrieve molecule pointers
00386       iPtr = &(system().molecule(speciesId_, iMol));
00387       jPtr = &(system().molecule(speciesId_, jMol));
00388 
00389       // Number of molecules
00390       nMol = system().nMolecule(speciesId_);
00391 
00392       // Number of atoms per molecule
00393       nAtom = iPtr->nAtom();
00394 
00395       // Auxiliary variables
00396       signRegrow = sign * (nRegrow_ + 1);
00397       bridgeLengthSq = bridgeLength_ * bridgeLength_;
00398 
00399       // Initialize returning variable
00400       found = false;
00401 
00402       // Check if i1 to j2 bridging is possible
00403       iPos1 = iPtr->atom(beginId).position();
00404       jPos2 = jPtr->atom(beginId + signRegrow).position();
00405       lengthSq = boundary().distanceSq(iPos1, jPos2);
00406 
00407       if (lengthSq < bridgeLengthSq) {
00408          // Check if j2 to i1 bridging is possible          
00409          jPos1 = jPtr->atom(beginId).position();
00410          iPos2 = iPtr->atom(beginId + signRegrow).position();
00411          lengthSq = boundary().distanceSq(iPos2, jPos1);
00412                   
00413          if (lengthSq < bridgeLengthSq) {
00414             found = true;
00415          } else {
00416             prob = 0.0;
00417             return found;
00418          }
00419       } else {
00420          prob = 0.0;
00421          return found;
00422       }
00423 
00424       // Auxiliary variables
00425       headId = (sign == -1) ? (nAtom-1) : 0;
00426       iMol = system().moleculeId(*iPtr);
00427 
00428       // Nullify counters
00429       nPairs = 0; 
00430 
00431       // Loop over j molecules to scan possible pairs
00432       for (j = 0; j < nMol; ++j) {
00433 
00434          jPtr = &(system().molecule(speciesId_, j));
00435 
00436          if (j != iMol) {
00437 
00438             for (k = 0; k <  nAtom - 1 - nRegrow_; ++k) {  
00439 
00440                // Check if i1 to j2 bridging is possible
00441                iPos1 = iPtr->atom(headId + k*sign).position();
00442                jPos2 = jPtr->atom(headId + signRegrow + k*sign).position();
00443                lengthSq = boundary().distanceSq(iPos1, jPos2);
00444 
00445                if (lengthSq < bridgeLengthSq) {
00446                   // Check if j2 to j1 bridging is possible          
00447                   jPos1 = jPtr->atom(headId + k*sign).position();
00448                   iPos2 = iPtr->atom(headId + signRegrow + k*sign).position();
00449                   lengthSq = boundary().distanceSq(iPos2, jPos1);
00450                   
00451                   if (lengthSq < bridgeLengthSq) nPairs += 1;
00452                }
00453 
00454             } // loop over atom positions
00455          } // if j != iMol
00456       } // loop over j molecules
00457  
00458       // nPairs is always greater than or equal to 1
00459       prob = 1.0 / double(nPairs);
00460       return found;
00461    }
00462    
00463 }
